Build static sites with gtml

An opinionated static site generator that compiles components and routes into static HTML assets. Create reusable HTML components and build your site with ease.

Get Started
View on GitHub

Hello World Example

Get started with a simple example

components/Greeting.html 
<div props='name string'>
  <h1 class="text-2xl font-bold">
    Hello, {name}!
  </h1>
</div>
routes/index.html 
<html>
  <body>
    <Greeting name="World" />
  </body>
</html>
Compiled Output: dist/index.html 
<html>
  <body>
    <div data-greeting="">
      <h1 class="text-2xl font-bold">
        Hello, World!
      </h1>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

Why gtml?

Simple & Fast

No complex build systems. Just HTML components that compile to static files.

Component-Based

Create reusable components with props and slots for maximum flexibility.

Zero Runtime

Pure static HTML output. No JavaScript framework overhead in production.

Interactive Components

GTML includes interactive components with signals for dynamic user experiences
